name: Scream Folding
description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} on [Scream v2](http://scream.sh) simultaneously to earn SCREAM. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

en.name: Scream Folding
en.description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} on [Scream v2](http://scream.sh) simultaneously to earn SCREAM. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

fr.name: Scream Folding
fr.description: Fournit et emprunte simultanément du {{token}} sur [Scream v2](http://scream.sh) pour gagner des jetons SCREAM. Les jetons gagnés sont récoltés, vendus pour plus de {{token}} qui sont ensuite redéposés dans la stratégie.

es.name: Scream Folding
es.description: Suministra y pide prestado {{token}} en [Scream v2](http://scream.sh) simultáneamente para ganar SCREAM. Los tokens ganados se cosechan, se venden por más {{token}} que se deposita nuevamente en la estrategia.

de.description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} on [Scream v2](http://scream.sh) simultaneously to earn SCREAM. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

el.description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} on [Scream v2](http://scream.sh) simultaneously to earn SCREAM. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

tr.name: Scream Folding
tr.description: SCREAM kazanmak için aynı anda [Scream v2](http://scream.sh)'de hem {{token}} sağlar hem ödünç alır. Kazanılan jetonlar toplanır, daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır ve ardından stratejiye geri yatırılır.

vi.name: Scream Folding
vi.description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} on [Scream v2](http://scream.sh) simultaneously to earn SCREAM. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

zh.name: Scream Folding
zh.description: 同时在 [Scream v2](http://scream.sh) 存入和借出 {{token}} 以赚取 SCREAM。收获到代币会被卖掉，换为更多 {{token}} 并进行复投。

hi.name: Scream Folding
hi.description: SCREAM कमाने के लिए [Scream v2](http://scream.sh) पर {{token}} की आपूर्ति और उधार एक साथ। अर्जित टोकन वसूल किया जाता है, अधिक {{token}} के लिए बेचा जाता है जिसे वापस रणनीति में जमा किया जाता है।
